1.title: The Haunted Manor House

episode of.title: Isolation: All Alone or Are You? (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: "ISOLATION"- TERRIFIED; Victim- Barb This is a Paranormal Reality show featuring your Favorite Paranormal Host "JB" This Season 2 Premiere scary Episode 1 was filmed just west of Haunted Gettysburg, Pa in this Civil War dated Haunted Mansion, Abandoned and all alone for over 30 plus years. Barb wanted to find out what lurks in this abandoned Manor house.This show will put you all alone in a known haunted location with just a night vision camera; scary and terrifying. No place to run, No place to Hide!

2.title: The Sanitarium

episode of.title: Isolation: All Alone or Are You? (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: "Isolation" This is a Reality show based on the Fear from within, watch as Dennis a willing participant get isolated in this crazy haunted Asylum-St. Albans Sanitarium in Radford, VA all alone with just a Night vision camera and maybe a flashlight! This is Psychological terror, watch as the mind plays games on the victims! Will they run and hide, will they scream for help, will they freeze as the spirits come out of the darkness for them? Be part of our Isolation show now-
